version_description:
+ Fix issues with on-ship combat on Beginner
+ Bug Fixes for Plasma Gun and Sentry crash
+ Now clears room output queue on game load
+ Fix issues with Black Hole difficulty level

Version 1.1:
+ New Missions - New enemies and new challenges await!
+ Cloud Saves - Save your game on your tablet then continue your journey on your mobile phone!
+ Ship Output - Monitor the efficiency of your ship with Room outputs!
+ Bug Fixes Galore!

Added 64-bit support for iOS 11.
(Please send any issues to starcommandhelp [at] gmail.com)

1.2 - iOS 11 Support

1.2.1 - Various bug fixes and visual tweaks.
• Crew not healing, nor gaining skill while healing
• Princess starts with 0,0,0 instead defined skill units
• Crew selection halos are missing
• Top bar info during battle is clipped and has poor layout on iPad 10.5 (among others)
• The ship weapons fire extra shots and deal no damage [6sPlus]
• The SBE doesn't appear and issues with that mission

Known Issues (will have another update soon to follow):
- Still testing fixes for various reported crashes. (Using a Sentry being one)

Issues? Report them:
starcommandhelp [at] gmail

1.2 - iOS 11 Support
1.2.2 - Various bug fixes.
• Crew HP Bars not showing after load, nor hiding when full
• Using sentry causes crash
• Grenades are not exploding
• Minigame extra target upgrade not working (bonuses are failing)

1.2.1
• Crew not healing, nor gaining skill while healing
• Princess starts with 0,0,0 instead defined skill units
• Crew selection halos are missing
• Top bar info during battle is clipped and has poor layout on iPad 10.5 (among others)
• The ship weapons fire extra shots and deal no damage [6sPlus]
• The SBE doesn't appear and issues with that mission

Issues? Report them:
starcommandhelp [at] gmail

1.2 - iOS 11 Support

1.2.3 - Various bug fixes.
• Improved the visuals for enemy on-ship combat (some w/o trails)
• Fixed and confirmed special on-ship combat working (fireant, etc)
• Improved enemy AI slightly
• Engineers no longer receive skill or experience when repairing a Sentry

1.2.2 - Various bug fixes.
• Crew HP Bars not showing after load, nor hiding when full
• Using sentry causes crash
• Grenades are not exploding
• Minigame extra target upgrade not working (bonuses are failing)

Issues? Report them:
starcommandhelp [at] gmail

1.2.4 - Various bug fixes.
• Hopefully fixed issues with the Antoria end-game mission
• Death counter for use with Revive has wrong Z-order
• Removed the ability for crew to become zombies (for now)
• Improved pinch to zoom and pan
• Revive seems to work, but let us know if it still has issues
• Hide white debug squares that were left in release

• Improved the visuals for enemy on-ship combat (some w/o trails)
• Fixed and confirmed special on-ship combat working (fireant, etc)
• Improved enemy AI slightly
• Engineers no longer receive skill or experience when repairing a Sentry

• Minigame extra target upgrade not working (bonuses are failing)

starcommandhelp [at] gmail

1.2.5 - Various bug fixes.
• Support for iPhone X
• Swapped out asset for Sentry marker (was missing - 'white box')
• Fixes to last mission
• Fixes to SBE mission
• Minor improvements to dialog and hail UI

Issues? starcommandhelp [at] gmail

1.2.6 - Removed iPhoneX debug backgrounds and restore stencil buffer

1.2.7 - Fixed crash related to choices in specific mission sequence events

Issues? starcommandhelp [at] gmail

This app has been updated by Apple to display the Apple Watch app icon.

1.2.8
- Fixes for bugs introduced in 1.2.7
- Fixed an infrequent crash that occurs when exiting weapon minigame.

Issues? starcommandhelp [at] gmail
